# Information For Visiting Scholars {#information-for-visiting-scholars}

Review the materials presented by [ISSO](https://isso.ucsf.edu/resources) to secure housing, set up a bank account, and secure your social security number. Certain electronic devices (e.g. Huawei models) will not work in USA mobile networks, so swapping a SIM card is not an option. If you want access to a telephone and mobile/data plan while here, you will need to plan accordingly.  You will need to have a credit card (not a debit card) in order to set up this service. In order to use your laptop with UCSF networks, it will need to meet minimum [requirements](https://it.ucsf.edu/how-to/technology-requirements-students)
